Line3.FB729: They left for Kor Valar this morning. They'll have food, training...more than I can give them.
VoiceDir1.FB728: Friendly, talking to a neighbor about their children, who have gone off to join the Knights Penitent
VoiceDir3.FB729: Sad to see her children go off, but proud of what they'll do
Line1.FB728: Say, where are those girls of yours? Finally ran off to play knight, have they?
